column4: I just went to this page to try to fix my video resolution... help.ubuntu.com/community/FixVideoResolutionHowto. I put in these commands... sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.custom
I have done everythiung that site said to fix my video resolution, but the commands it has me do just resets up the keyboard. Any ideas?
may you like to fix your video resolution over "sudo displayconfig-gtk" in an terminal?
